page.title: 15LIFE STYLES:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: The {Life Style}of the villages is still influenced by rural background and traditions;extremes of fashion and {pop culture}are not usually seen altho' most people can get to nearby towns for discos and pubs.The village inns are more used by families and the School,Village Hall, and Woodpecker's Club provide meeting places for a variety of activities which cater for, and possibly shape,the tastes of the residents.Children's football and cricket on the Green prepare for village cricket at weekends,which is still a focus for{family life.}Active attendance at theatres and concerts is difficult,but the local radio station keeps its' listeners informed and complements national{radio and {television,}which have a powerful effect on a rural community somewhat cut off from mainstream affairs.
